We have just arrived!\""},{"lineNumber":176533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank is...!\""},{"lineNumber":176541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマン組も参上！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Helman Squad has also arrived!\""},{"lineNumber":176542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これよりは俺達も加勢する！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From now on, we will join the fight too!"},{"lineNumber":176543,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遅れちまって悪かったな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry for being late!\""},{"lineNumber":176544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かった……間に合ったんですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank goodness... you made it in sorry we haven't been able to assist you until now."},{"lineNumber":176549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これよりは私達も共に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, we will also fight alongside Leave it to us!\""},{"lineNumber":176552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってわけで！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So then!"},{"lineNumber":176553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早速びーむ撃ちますよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll start firing beams right fine.\""},{"lineNumber":176555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーーーー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhh…\""},{"lineNumber":176556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、これなら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, with this...\""},{"lineNumber":176557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずは目の前の敵をブッ倒せー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, knock down the enemies right in front of us!\""},{"lineNumber":176558,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼我の戦闘力の差に加え、","translatedEnglishLine":"In addition to the difference in combat abilities,"},{"lineNumber":176559,"originalJapaneseLine":"挟み撃ちとあっては魔物兵達に為す術はなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"and being caught in a pincer attack, the monster soldiers had no way to resist,"},{"lineNumber":176560,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵の魔物はあっという間に全滅となった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the enemy monsters were wiped out in no time."},{"lineNumber":176561,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":176562,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":176563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、こんなもんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, is that about it?\""},{"lineNumber":176564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「逃げ出した敵の姿ないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There’s no sign of any fleeing enemies.\""},{"lineNumber":176565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これでしばらくは落ち着けるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We should be able to relax for a while now.\""},{"lineNumber":176566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん、ご無事だったんですね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, you’re safe!\""},{"lineNumber":176567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおぉんおんおんおん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah, Waaah Waaah Waaah!"},{"lineNumber":176568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　香様〜！　よくぞご無事でおられた〜！","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Kaoru~! I’m so glad you’re safe~!"},{"lineNumber":176569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心配しておりましたぞ〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We were so worried about you~!\""},{"lineNumber":176570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおんおんおん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah Waaah Waaah!\""},{"lineNumber":176571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほんに良かった〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s really great news~!\""},{"lineNumber":176572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおおお！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wooooaaaahhhhh! (x3)\""},{"lineNumber":176573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、３Ｇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, 3G."},{"lineNumber":176574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなに泣かないで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t cry that much...\""},{"lineNumber":176575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂らもおりますぞ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’re here as well. Nununun.\""},{"lineNumber":176576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ！　これもALICE様のお導き！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed! This is also thanks to ALICE-sama’s guidance!"},{"lineNumber":176577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間に合ったことに感謝を！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are grateful to have made it in time!\""},{"lineNumber":176578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガッスさん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Megass-san!"},{"lineNumber":176579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロードリングさんも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Road Ring-san too!\""},{"lineNumber":176580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんにしても、これで全員集合だすな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, now everyone’s assembled!"},{"lineNumber":176581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おら、とっても嬉しいだす！","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m really happy about that!"},{"lineNumber":176582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay!\""},{"lineNumber":176583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーいわーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay yay!\""},{"lineNumber":176584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に良かったですねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s truly wonderful.\""},{"lineNumber":176585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly..."},{"lineNumber":176586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どいつもこいつも遅いんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"All of them are so late.\""},{"lineNumber":176587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そもそも無茶するランスが悪いんだけどね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Originally, it’s Lance’s fault for acting recklessly though...\""},{"lineNumber":176588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、よくここにいると分かったな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, how did you know we’d be here...\""},{"lineNumber":176589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is...\""},{"lineNumber":176590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたのおかげだろ？　暗黒魔女さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to you, right? Dark Witch-san.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス組！　ただ今参上しました！」
みんな、無事だったのね……」
「とりあえずこの敵どうにかしてねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, do something about these enemies—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また、別の場所では爆発のような、
衝撃波が魔物兵達を深く斬り裂いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A shockwave deeply cleaved through the monster soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これよりは俺達も加勢する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From now on, we will join the fight too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遅れちまって悪かったな！」
「良かった……間に合ったんですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank goodness... you made it in time..."
"We couldn't just not participate in such a big showdown,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加しないわけにもいかねぇからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so there's no way we'd skip it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までお力になれず申し訳ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry we haven't been able to assist you until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これよりは私達も共に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, we will also fight alongside you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早速びーむ撃ちますよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll start firing beams right away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずは目の前の敵をブッ倒せー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, knock down the enemies right in front of us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼我の戦闘力の差に加え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In addition to the difference in combat abilities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 挟み撃ちとあっては魔物兵達に為す術はなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and being caught in a pincer attack, the monster soldiers had no way to resist,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の魔物はあっという間に全滅となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the enemy monsters were wiped out in no time.
"There’s no sign of any fleeing enemies."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでしばらくは落ち着けるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We should be able to relax for a while now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆さん、ご無事だったんですね！」
香様〜！　よくぞご無事でおられた〜！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Kaoru~! I’m so glad you’re safe~!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配しておりましたぞ〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were so worried about you~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ！　これもALICE様のお導き！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed! This is also thanks to ALICE-sama’s guidance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合ったことに感謝を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are grateful to have made it in time!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんにしても、これで全員集合だすな！
おら、とっても嬉しいだす！
どいつもこいつも遅いんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of them are so late."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも無茶するランスが悪いんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, it’s Lance’s fault for acting recklessly though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、よくここにいると分かったな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, how did you know we’d be here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたのおかげだろ？　暗黒魔女さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you, right? Dark Witch-san."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
